name: Zombie Game
description:
Interesting and paranormal events are experienced in the research center where many years of research and interesting experiments have been carried out.
Our character, who has been assigned to go to research here, encounters very dangerous non-human zombies in this research place, and our character starts to defend himself by pulling his gun and fighting against them, and then he enters a lot of action and conflict.
Fights with the zombies inside for hours after long conflict action, after the excitement, there are not only zombies inside, he comes into conflict with different specially assigned teams and the fight increases in the research center.



Game features

beautiful smooth graphics

fps mode

detailed coating effects

exciting realistic sound effects

throw bombs

fluent graphics

quality rain effects
